titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 1993
A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other puropses.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13915)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

bill.summary: 10/19/1993--Introduced. Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 1993 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.
